info.mtgdb.api

Class Db

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.mtgdb.api.Db

  • public class Db
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the primary API class. It allows for querying the mtgdb.info database for cards and sets.
    Since:
    2014-03-20
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Joseph Rios

        Retrieve set information based upon their set ids.
        Parameters:
        ids - An ArrayList of 3-character set ids.
        Returns:

      • getCards

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Card> getCards(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> multiverseIds)
        Retrieve cards based upon their multiverse ids.
        Parameters:
        multiverseIds - A List of multiverse ids
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Card objects corresponding to the ids.

      • getSetCards

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Card> getSetCards(java.lang.String setId,
                                    int start,
                                    int end)
        Gets cards in a set. You can start and end to page through the card sets. This uses the card number.
        Parameters:
        setId - String set name (3 characters)
        start - Beginning index of cards in this set to fetch.
        end - Ending index of cards in this set to fetch.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Card objects.

      • getCards

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Card> getCards(java.lang.String name)
        Get all versions of a card with the supplied name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the card.
        Returns:
        A ArrayList of Card objects.

      • getSetCards

      • getCards

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Card> getCards(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> fields)

      • searchCards

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Card> searchCards(java.lang.String searchText)
        Returns a list of cards matching the supplied query string. Note that it will not filter for size, so a generic or empty query string will return many, many cards. Non alphanumberic characters are removed prior to querying (with the exception of the space and '-' characters).
        Parameters:
        searchText - String representing the text to search for.
        Returns:
        ArrayList matching the query text.

      • getCards

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Card> getCards()
        Gets the entire card database. Useful creating a local copy. This method may take up to a few minutes to run.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Card objects.

      • filterCards

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Card> filterCards(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> filters)
        Parameters:
        filters - HashMap containing a mapping of keys to values. For example colors and black.
        Returns:
        ArrayList
